This is a tactical error.
What is the correct continuation for black?
What is the correct continuation for black?

This is a blunder.  The correct continuation is 7. ... d4  8. a3 Ba5!  9. b4 dxc3 threatening the queen, and now 10. Qxd8+ can be met by Bxd8 getting the bishop out of danger.  Playing 7. ... Ba5 first is the same thing because the pin isn't going anywhere.
This is also a blunder, since playing 8. a3 saves white from 8. ... d4.
